name: HSPC_HIS_COMP_INFO
description: This table stores information about which users contributed to filling out the Hospice Item set. This correlates to item Z0400 on the hospice item set.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMPLETING_USER_ID
columns.description: This item tracks which users contributed to filling out the Hospice Item Set. This correlates directly to item Z0400 on the HIS.

columns.name: COMPLETING_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SECT_COMPLETED_DATE
columns.description: This item tracks the date that a given user contributed to filling out the Hospice Item Set. This correlates directly to item Z0400 on the HIS.
